fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article (European laws could raise cost of Labour nationalisation plans, 28 November, page 52) wrongly referred to the energy charter treaty (ECT) as an EU law. The ECT is in fact an international treaty, applying to most EU countries. • Other recently corrected articles include: London Bridge: attacker had been jailed for al-Qaida inspired bomb plot ‘Can’t let Corbyn in’: Brexit and NHS top concerns in Morecambe ‘The bike saved me’: cycling project for vulnerable people under threat My debt to Clive James, the howlingly funny critic who made TV-writing sing
